oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vine Glenn Missionary Baptist Church, 2001 July
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Vine Glenn Missionary Baptist Church located at 217 Joyner Avenue in Nashville, Tennessee. According to the cornerstone, this church was rebuilt in 1928 under the name Vine Glen First Baptist Church. The current name is Vine Glenn Missionary Baptist Church. The foundation is concrete. The exterior walls are rock faced concrete blocks. The roof is made of shingles. The windows have blue painted glass panes. The doors are a combination of glass, steel and wood. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vine Glenn Missionary Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Vine Glen First Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
